title: "You have been disconnected"
body:
I can't put into words how much this bug pisses me off, and it's getting more and more common.

I've done everything to remedy it, from updating drivers to updating my OS (Win7 64bit) to reinstalling League several times.

Any known solution? I have a feeling I got the leave penalty this time because, as well as with my Rengar game a small while back, I crashed mid-fight and can't reconnect.

replies.body:
You took some pretty good first steps to try and troubleshoot this on your own, but this sounds like more of an issue between your network and our servers rather than a software/driver problem. Since you're getting these disconnections mid-game, your network might only have a hard time talking with our game servers. 

Let's go through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can narrow down what's keeping you from having a stable connection with our servers.
